mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT orderNum, email, storeName, storeLogo, num, tableNum, amount, reviewExist, cancel, confirm, regdate FROM order_ WHERE email = #{email } GROUP BY orderNum, email, storeName, storeLogo, num, tableNum, amount, reviewExist, cancel, confirm, regdate ORDER BY orderNum ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT orderNum, email, storeName, storeLogo, num, tableNum, amount, reviewExist, cancel, confirm, regdate FROM order_ WHERE num = #{num } GROUP BY orderNum, email, storeName, storeLogo, num, tableNum, amount, reviewExist, cancel, confirm, regdate
ORDER BY orderNum DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_ (orderNum, email, storeName, storeLogo, num, tableNum, menu, menuCount, price, amount, reviewExist, confirm, cancel, regdate) VALUES(#{orderNum },#{email }, #{storeName }, #{storeLogo }, #{num }, #{tableNum }, #{menu }, #{menuCount }, #{price }, #{amount }, 'NO' , 'NO' , 'NO' , #{regdate })
